content: Blues singer and guitarist Robert Johnson would have been 100 years old on May 8th of 2011 if he hadn't died when he was 27 years old.
translations: ita:Il cantante e chitarrista blues Robert Johnson avrebbe compiuto 100 anni l'8 maggio 2011 se non fosse morto quando ne av
